author: bojan
msg: Be a bit more specific about what is a directory.

author: bojan
msg: Instead of mixing URI's with filenames, which was wrong, just use filenames to stat. This will also take care of aliases, but be warned - URI will still be passed to Tomcat unchanged.

author: bojan
msg: Be a bit more paranoid about leading slashes in the URI.

author: bojan
msg: Revert MT's fix for the order of hooks. Apply the fix similar to fix for 9913.

author: bojan
msg: Revert the old fix for default pages and apply a slightly more complicated one.
